Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
wxExAppOffers the application, with wxExtension specific init and exit
wxExColumnOffers a column to be used in a wxListCtrl. Facilitates sorting
wxExCommandThis class offers functionality around wxExecute
wxExConfigDialogOffers a dialog to set several items in the config
wxExConfigItemContainer class for using with wxExConfigDialog
wxExDialogOffers a general dialog, with a separated button sizer at the bottom
wxExDirAdds FindFiles to a wxDir
wxExDirOpenFileAllows you to easily open all files on specified path
wxExDirToolOffers a wxExDir with tool support
wxExDirWithListViewOffers a wxExDir with reporting to a listview
wxExFileAdds several File* methods to wxFile
wxExFileDialogAdds an wxExFile to wxFileDialog
wxExFileNameAdds a wxExStat and a wxExLexer member to wxFileName
wxExFileStatisticsOffers file statistics for elements and keywords
wxExFindReplaceDataAdds an existing config to wxFindReplaceData, and some members
wxExFindToolBarOffers a find toolbar, containing a find combobox, up and down arrows and checkboxes
wxExFrameOffers a frame with easy statusbar methods, find/replace, and allows for file dropping
wxExFrameWithHistoryAdds file and project history support to wxExManagedFrame
wxExGridOffers popup menu with copy/paste, printing
wxExGridStatistics< T >Helper class for adding clear menu to the grid, and calling Clear for the statistics
wxExHeaderThis class offers methods to make a file header
wxExIndicatorThis class defines our scintilla indicators
wxExLexerThis class defines a lexer using file extensions, syntax colouring and comment definitions
wxExLexersCollection of all lexers
wxExListItemOffers a list item associated with a file on an wxExListView
wxExListViewAdds printing, popup menu, images, columns and items to wxListView
wxExListViewFileCombines wxExListViewWithFrame and wxExFile, giving you a list control with file synchronization support
wxExListViewStandardAdds some standard lists
wxExListViewWithFrameAdds a wxExFrameWithHistory to wxExListViewStandard
wxExManagedFrameOffers an aui managed frame with a notebook multiple document interface, used by the notebook classes, and toolbar, findbar and vibar support
wxExMarkerThis class defines our scintilla markers
wxExMenuAdds artid, edit, printing and tool menu items to wxMenu
wxExNotebookOffers a notebook with page mapping and interfaces with wxExManagedFrame
wxExOTLOffers methods to the otl connection
wxExPrintingOffers printing support
wxExProcessOffers a wxProcess with output to a listview
wxExPropertyThis class defines our scintilla properties
wxExRCSClass for keeping RCS information
wxExStatAdds IsOk to the stat base class, several methods to get/update on the stat members, and Sync to sync the stat from disk
wxExStatistics< T >Offers base statistics
wxExStatusBarOffers a status bar that calls virtual methods from wxExFrame
wxExStatusBarPaneThis class defines our statusbar panes, used by wxExFrame::SetupStatusBar
wxExSTCOffers a styled text ctrl with find/replace, printing, popup menu, macro support, vi support and lexer support (syntax colouring, folding)
wxExSTCEntryDialogOffers an wxExSTC as a dialog (like wxTextEntryDialog)
wxExSTCFileAdds file read and write to wxExSTC
wxExSTCShellThis class offers a wxExSTC with support for commands
wxExSTCWithFrameAdds a frame to wxExSTC
wxExStockArtOffers a collection of art, mapping stock id's to art id's
wxExStyleThis class defines our scintilla styles
wxExTextFileAdds file tool methods to wxTextFile
wxExTextFileWithListViewOffers a wxExTextFile with reporting to a listview
wxExToolOffers tool methods and contains the tool info's
wxExToolBarOffers a toolbar together with stock art
wxExToolInfoThis class defines our tool info
wxExVCSThis class collects all vcs handling
wxExVCSCommandThis class contains a single vcs command
wxExVCSEntryThis class collects a single vcs
wxExViOffers a class that extends wxExSTC with vi behaviour
